resources.string:
Event booking App Term of Use Terms of Use: By accessing our event booking app, users agree to abide by terms including account creation responsibilities, adherence to event organizer terms, and lawful use. Intellectual property rights, limitations of liability, and modification of terms are outlined, governed by local laws.
Privacy Policy: Our app collects user data for booking processes, service improvements, and communication. Information may be shared with event organizers and secured with encryption measures. Cookies may be used for enhanced browsing. Third-party links are disclosed, and data retention policies are explained. Users are notified of policy updates, with contact information provided for inquiries.
By continuing you accept our Privacy Policy and Term of Use
